text: "Countdown" is a 2011 song by Beyoncé. It was taken from her fourth studio album 4. It went to number 1 in Germany, number 71 in the United States, number 35 in the United Kingdom, number 45 in Ireland, number 92 in the Netherlands, number 62 in Canada and number 40 in South Korea. == Track listing == *Digital download # "Countdown" – 3:32 # "Countdown" (RedTop Radio Edit – Clean) – 3:57 *;Digital download – Remixes EP #"Countdown" – 3:31 #"Countdown" (Reggae Rewind Remix) – 4:04 #"Countdown" (Olli Collins & Fred Portelli Remix) – 6:10 #"Countdown" (Jack Beats Remix) – 4:03 #"Countdown" (Single Version) [Music Video] – 3:32 ==References== Category:2011 songs Category:Funk songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Beyoncé songs
title: Countdown (song)
